title: LA-18-09: 2017 Conflict of Interest Prosecution Survey
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/3AFEB8DA55B30DD0852585BA005BEC30/$FILE/LA-18-09 2017 Conflict of Interest Prosecution Survey.pdf?open
summary: OGE has completed its annual survey of prosecutions involving the conflict of interest criminal statutes and other related statutes for the period January 1, 2017 through December 31, 2017.
